entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
